players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Charlie is the detective and he knows who the mafioso is"
Bob: "Bob is innocent and I have no information to share at this time."
Charlie: "I will continue to investigate and gather more information. I will keep an eye on Bob as he is the mafioso."
You: "I am still trying to figure out what happened. I will keep an eye on everyone and gather more information."

Bob: "Bob still maintains his innocence and has no information to share at this time. However, I would like to remind everyone that the detective's identity is not yet known. Let us focus on gathering more evidence before making any accusations."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
